name: berry-juice
effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Restores 20 HP.

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
A 100% pure juice
that restores HP
by 20 points.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
A 100% pure juice
that restores HP
by 20 points.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
A 100% pure juice.
It restores the HP of one POKéMON
by 20 points.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
A 100% pure juice made of Berries.
It restores the HP of one Pokémon by
just 20 points.
